name: 5-Meal Plan

meal_1_breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt Berry Bowl
meal_1_breakfast.instructions: Mix yogurt with honey, top with berries, chia seeds, and granola

meal_2_morning_snack.name: Apple with Sunflower Seed Butter
meal_2_morning_snack.instructions: Slice apple and serve with sunflower seed butter for dipping

meal_3_lunch.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
meal_3_lunch.instructions: Cook quinoa according to package directions. Mix with vegetables, feta, and dressing ingredients

meal_4_afternoon_snack.name: Hummus with Veggie Sticks
meal_4_afternoon_snack.instructions: Prepare vegetables and serve with hummus for dipping

meal_5_dinner.name: Herb-Crusted Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
meal_5_dinner.instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F. Toss vegetables with oil, salt, and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes. Season salmon with herbs and pan-sear for 4-5 minutes per side

dairy_and_eggs: 1 large container plain Greek yogurt (32 oz)

night_before: No prep required - all meals are designed for quick preparation
morning_prep: Cook quinoa for lunch (can be done while having breakfast)
Wash and cut vegetables for snacks and dinner
cooking_timeline: 7:00 AM - Prepare Greek yogurt bowl (5 min)
8:00 AM - Cook quinoa for lunch (15 min)
3:30 PM - Prepare veggie sticks and hummus (5 min)
6:00 PM - Start dinner prep - roast vegetables and cook salmon (25 min)

key_nutrients: High in omega-3 fatty acids from salmon
Rich in fiber from quinoa, vegetables, and fruits
Good source of probiotics from Greek yogurt
High in antioxidants from berries and colorful vegetables
Complete protein sources throughout the day

general_health_goals.balanced_nutrition: ✓ Provides balanced macronutrients with emphasis on whole foods
general_health_goals.variety: ✓ High variety with different protein sources, grains, fruits, and vegetables
general_health_goals.nutrient_density: ✓ Each meal provides essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants
general_health_goals.energy_levels: ✓ Steady energy throughout the day with 5 balanced meals
general_health_goals.digestive_health: ✓ High fiber content supports digestive wellness

dietary_restrictions.nut_allergy_compliance: ✓ Completely nut-free menu with safe alternatives like sunflower seed butter
dietary_restrictions.allergen_alternatives: ✓ Uses seeds instead of nuts for healthy fats and protein

lifestyle_factors.quick_prep: ✓ All meals can be prepared in 25 minutes or less
lifestyle_factors.practical_portions: ✓ Realistic serving sizes for sustainable eating

daily_tips: Drink water throughout the day - aim for 8-10 glasses
All ingredients are naturally nut-free, but always check labels on processed items
Quinoa can be cooked in batches and refrigerated for up to 5 days
Vegetables can be prepped the night before to save time
Sunflower seed butter is a great nut-free alternative that provides healthy fats
